DataElement.preferredName: General Surgical Complication Endocrine and Metabolic Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term that represents the kind of  endocrine and metabolic related to surgery.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Generalized Surgical Procedure Complication Endocrine And Metabolic System
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Widespread, broadly dispersed, common._A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery._Any disease or disorder that occurs during the course of, or because of, another disease, treatment, or procedure._Collective designation for those tissues capable of secreting hormones._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._Having to do with metabolism (the total of all chemical changes that take place in a cell or an organism to produce energy and basic materials needed for important life processes)._A group of independent but interrelated elements comprising a unified whole.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Widespread, broadly dispersed, common.:A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.:Any disease or disorder that occurs during the course of, or because of, another disease, treatment, or procedure.

Concepts.definition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.
Any disease or disorder that occurs during the course of, or because of, another disease, treatment, or procedure.

Property.preferredDefinition: Collective designation for those tissues capable of secreting hormones.:An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.:Having to do with metabolism.:a group of independent but interrelated elements comprising a unified whole.

Concepts.definition: Collective designation for those tissues capable of secreting hormones.
An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.
A group of independent but interrelated elements comprising a unified whole.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results or effects (does not include CTC Adverse Events) of therapeutic agents or procedures administered to the patient.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Princess Margaret as requested by D.Laurence. mc 6/15/16

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An endocrine disorder characterized by decreased production of parathyroid hormone by the parathyroid glands. It is usually caused by damage of the parathyroid glands during head and neck surgery. Signs and symptoms include muscle cramps, abdominal pain, dry skin, brittle nails, cataracts, tetany, and convulsions.

Concepts.definition: An endocrine disorder characterized by decreased production of parathyroid hormone by the parathyroid glands. It is usually caused by damage of the parathyroid glands during head and neck surgery. Signs and symptoms include muscle cramps, abdominal pain, dry skin, brittle nails, cataracts, tetany, and convulsions.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Acute onset of severe, life-threatening hyperthyroidism caused by a sudden release of excessive thyroid hormone.

Concepts.definition: Acute onset of severe, life-threatening hyperthyroidism caused by a sudden release of excessive thyroid hormone.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not identified from previous encounters or knowledge.: Abnormally low levels of thyroid hormone.

Concepts.definition: Not identified from previous encounters or knowledge.
Abnormally low levels of thyroid hormone.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Having no previous example or precedent or parallel; of a kind not seen before.: An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.: Not controlled, regulated, or constrained.: A metabolic disorder characterized by abnormally high blood sugar levels due to diminished production of insulin or insulin resistance/desensitization.

Concepts.definition: Having no previous example or precedent or parallel; of a kind not seen before.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
A metabolic disorder characterized by abnormally high blood sugar levels due to diminished production of insulin or insulin resistance/desensitization.
